member.name: IMFContentDecryptorContext.InitializeHardwareKey
member.summary: Allows the display driver to return IHV-specific information used when initializing a new hardware key.
member.param: The number of bytes in the buffer that InputPrivateData specifies.

The contents of this parameter are defined by the implementation of
the protection system that runs in the security processor. The contents may contain data about license or stream properties.

The return data is also defined by the implementation of the protection system implementation
that runs in the security processor. The contents may contain data associated with the underlying hardware key.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptorContext
member.summary: Allows a decryptor to manage hardware keys and decrypt hardware samples.
